item.description:
Let's meet up at the Liberty Hotel in The Yard again for drinks and/or a movie. FREE film with complimentary popcorn and pop chips as well as cash bar with movie candy for sale.

As always, get there when you can and stay as long or short as you're able.

The past two Mondays have been ideal evenings to be outside and hang out in this cool setting...enjoying the company of friendly fun folks. The movie begins close to 8 PM.

The Royal Tenenbaums is the film, a comedic drama. Plot: An estranged family of former child prodigies reunites when one of their member announces he has a terminal illness. Directed by Wes Anderson with an all star cast of Gene Hackman, Anjelica Huston, Ben Stiller, Gwyneth Paltrow, Luke Wilson, Owen Wilson, Bill Murray and Danny Glover.

Get on the guest list by emailing moviemondays@libertyhotel.com

Event Flyer

Courtyard Menu

Cocktail Menu

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Charles/MGH (red line) is the closest subway station and steps away. Government (green & blue lines) subway station is less than a ten (10) minute walk.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the doorman at the hotel entrance to direct you to the Courtyard...find me seated nearest the screen playing solitaire.
item.name: Drinks and/or a Movie at Liberty Hotel - Monday July 19th
